Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: can we use one try here?
timeline.author: albertwang-ibm

replies.bodyText: it's the pattern that Robin follows through the code. thus the transaction factory, and then the nested tries
replies.author: prb112

replies.bodyText: not sure if we need to close the connection or put it back to the connection pool ...
replies.author: albertwang-ibm

replies.bodyText: We do not need to put it back in the pool... from what I've reviewed in the code, however, you are correct that we need to do autocloseable.
replies.author: prb112

timeline.bodyText: better to remove the empty lines.
timeline.author: albertwang-ibm

timeline.message:
Prepopulate ResourceType Names in Tenant Allocation #811

- The resource_types.properties map is introduces to cache the reserved
logical_ids
- A corresponding correctness test is introduced into the build process
- Modify the CommonDatabaseAdapter to start at 1000

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>
